database.fullpath: Database Environment :: File-based DBMS :: Microsoft Access

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Other Operating Systems :: WinNT

name: Password mania
short_description:
This is a password management program that has all the basic functionalities you need to store your passwords safely. 
The program uses a password protected Microsoft Access database file, in which the passwords are safely encrypted using the 128 bit MD5 encryption method provided by the .NET framework. 

The program works completely off-line and all you need to do is extract the content in the .zip file to a folder on your computer. If your computer doesn't have Microsoft Access installed you also have to install the 'Microsoft Access Database Engine 2010 Redistributable' which can be downloaded here:
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=13255
summary: This is a desktop program that can be used to manage your passwords.
